name: Bribed Committe
text: Raise your terraform rating 2 steps
description: Influencing the people in power

name: Security Fleet
action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 fighter resource to this card
vp: 1 vp for each fighter resource on this card
description: Keeping the peace by force

name: Solar Wind Power
text: Increase your energy production 1 step and gain 2 titanium
description: Working those solar storms to your advantage

name: Towing A Comet
text: Gain 2 plants. Raise oxygen level 1 step and place an ocean tile
description: By aerobraking it we get its contents without the impact

name: 10 Mining Industries
text: Increase your titanium production 2 steps and your mega credit production 2 steps
vp: 1 VP per jovian tag you have
description: Supplying fuel and valuable minerals

name: Callisto Penal Mines
text: Increase your mega credit production 3 steps
description: You always wanted to be a warden, didn't you?

name: Small Animals
text: Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step.
vp: 1 VP per 2 animals on this card
description: Able to live in sparse conditions

name: Kelp Farming
text: Requires 6 ocean tiles. Increase your mega credit production 2 steps and your plant production 3 steps. Gain 2 plants
description: The newly formed oceans are very rich in minerals, perfect for food production

name: Tardigrades
vp: 1 VP per 4 microbes on this card
description: These microscopic creatures can survive freezing, boiling, drying out, heavy radiation, and brute force

name: Fish
text: Requires +2C or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step.
vp: 1 VP for each animal on this card
description: Martian barracudas? Why not!

name: Algae
text: Requires 5 ocean tiles. Gain 1 plant and increase your plant production 2 steps
description: Basic photosynthesizers in aqueous environments

name: Power Grid
text: Increase your energy production 1 step for each power tag you have, including this
description: Making efficient use of your energy production

name: Mine
text: Increase your steel production 1 step
description: Mars' main export industry also supplies the planet with construction materials

name: Deep Well Heating
text: Increase your energy production 1 step. Increase temperature 1 step
description: Digging deep to find heat from the core

name: Underground City
text: Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your steel production 2 steps
description: Excavating is expensive, but gives both protection and building materials

name: Grass
text: Requires -16C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 3 plants
description: Taking root in every crevice and patch of soil

name: Fueled Generators
text: Decrease your mega credit production 1 step and increase your energy production 1 step
description: Simple but limited power supply

name: Acquired Company
text: Increase your mega credit production 3 steps
description: This interplanetary company will surely pay off

name: Adapted Lichen
text: Increase your plant production 1 step
description: Suitable even for early terraforming

name: Quantum Extractor
effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2 mega credit less for it
text: Requires 4 science tags. Increase your energy production 4 steps
description: Tapping the very fabric of space

name: Giant Space Mirror
text: Increase your energy production 3 steps
description: Square kilometers of extra sunlight reflected down to a receiving power plant

name: Vesta Shipyard
text: Increase your titanium production 1 step
description: The pride of the asteriod belt

name: Asteroid
text: Raise temperature 1 step and gain 2 titanium. Remove up to 3 plants from any player
description: What are those plants doing in our impact zone?

name: Cloud Seeding
text: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Decrease your mega credit production 1 step and any heat production 1 step. Increase your plant production 2 steps
description: Lessens solar influx, but enhances plant growth

name: Giant Ice Asteroid
text: Raise temperature 2 steps and place 2 ocean tiles. Remove up to 6 plants from any player
description: Crash it. The bigger, the better

name: Sponsors
text: Increase your mega credit production 2 steps
description: Willing to support your projects

name: Inventors' Guild
action: LOOK AT THE TOP CARD AND EITHER BUY IT OR DISCARD IT
description: When great minds meet, new ideas abound

name: Water Import From Europa
action: Pay 12 mega credit to place an ocean tile. TITANIUM MAY BE USED as if playing a space card
vp: 1 VP for each jovian tag you have
description: With its low gravity, this Jovian ice moon is suitable for mass export of water

name: Search For Life
action: Spend 1 mega credit to reveal and discard the top of the draw deck. If that card has a microbe tag, add a science resource here
text: Oxygen must be 6% or less.
vp: 3 VPs if you have one or more science resources here
description: Finding native life-forms would be the greatest discovery in history, so let's find out!

name: Martian Rails
action: Spend 1 energy to gain 1 mega credit for each city tile ON MARS
description: Fast and cheap transportation for goods and guys

name: Electro Catapult
action: Spend 1 plant or 1 steel to gain 7 mega credit
text: Oxygen must be 8% or less. Decrease your energy production 1 step
desription: A 200km long acceleration ramp up the side of Pavonis Mons, hurtling export goods into space

name: Ironworks
action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 steel and increase oxygen 1 step
description: Electrolysis of Martian soil yields both iron and oxygen, making it an important part of terraforming

name: Rover Construction
effect: When any city tile is placed, gain 2 mega credit
description: Providing safe transport vehicles

name: Domed Crater
text: Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 3 plants and place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase mega credit production 3 steps
description: A spacious area for a great city

name: Development Center
action: Spend 1 energy to draw a card
description: Ensuring a constant influx of ideas

name: Methane From Titan
text: Requires 2% oxygen. Increase your heat production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps
description: Using Titan's liquid methane as fuel will add carbon and heat to Mars

name: Predators
action: Remove 1 animal from any card any add it to this card
text: Requires 11% oxygen
vp: 1 VP per animal on this card
description: Lions and tigers and bears, oh my

name: Black Polar Dust
text: Place an ocean tile. Decrease your mega credit production 2 steps and increase your heat production 3 steps
description: The sprinkled dust absorbs heat from the sun. Must be renewed after each snowfall, though

name: Research Outpost
effect: When you play a card, you pay 1 mega credit less for it
text: Place a city tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE
description: Finding new ways to do things

name: Noctis City
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your mega credit production 3 steps. Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA, disregarding normal placement restrictions
description: In Noctis Labyrinthus, where the mist is gray

name: Phobos Space Haven
text: Increase your titanium production 1 step and place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA
description: The doorway to mars

name: Arctic Algae
effect: When anyone places an ocean tile, gain 2 plants
text: It must be -12C or colder to play. Gain 1 plant
description: Suitable for freezing temperatures

name: Interstellar Colony Ship
text: Requires 5 science tags
description: To new horizons and an unknown galaxy

name: Optimal Aerobraking
effect: When you play a space event, you gain 3 mega credit and 3 heat
description: Perfecting the art of ballistic and material analysis can increase efficiency and save money

name: Lunar Beam
text: Decrease your mega credit production 2 steps and increase your heat production and energy production 2 steps each
description: A huge energy beam. Difficult to collect, but who cares?

name: EOS Chasma National Park
text: Requires -12C or warmer. Add 1 animal TO ANY ANIMAL CARD. Gain 3 plants. Increase your mega credit production 2 steps
description: A wonder of the world, doing wonders for the tourism business

name: Robotic Workforce
text: Duplicate only the production box of one of your building cards
description: Enhancing your production capacity

name: Heather
text: Requires -14C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant
description: Stabilizing the soil

name: Research
text: Counts as playing 2 science cards. Draw 2 cards
description: Through technical excellence you will unlock many wondrous things

name: Regolith Eaters
action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes from this card to raise oxygen level 1 step
description: Living on the rocks and excreting oxygen

name: Media Group
effect: After you play an event card, you gain 3 mega credit
description: Profiting on every spectacular story

name: Nuclear Zone
text: Place this tile and raise temperature 2 steps
description: Detonating obsolete nuclear weapons from Earth is an efficient method for raising the temperature

name: Toll Station
text: Increase your mega credit production 1 step for each space tag your OPPONENTS have
description: Licensed by the 'government'

name: Physics Complex
action: Spend 6 energy to add a science resource to this card
vp: 2 VP for each science resource on this card
description: This used to cause blackouts before the invention of supercomputers

name: Mass Converter
effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2 mega credit less for it
text: Requires 5 science tags. Increase your energy production 6 steps
description: E=mc^2. 1 kg = a LOT of energy

name: Greenhouses
text: Gain 1 plant for each city tile in play
description: Places to conduct bio research and experiments

name: Artificial Lake
text: Requires -6C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile ON AN AREA NOT RESERVED FOR OCEAN
description: Landscaping is as natural as terraforming

name: Business Network
action: Look at the top card and either buy it or discard it
text: Decrease your mega credit production 1 step
description: Investing in social events can open up new opportunities

name: GHG Producing Bacteria
action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes to raise temperature 1 step
text: Requires 4% oxygen
description: Working for the biosphere and the atmosphere at the same time

name: Ants
action: Remove 1 microbe from any card to add 1 to this card
text: Requires 4% oxygen
vp: 1 VP per 2 microbes on this card
description: Although an important part of many ecosystems, ants can also be detrimental to other organisms

name: Birds
action: Add an animal to this card
text: Requires 13% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 2 steps
vp: 1 VP for each animal on this card
description: Bringing life to the skies

name: Mars University
effect: When you play a science tag, including this, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card
description: A major step towards understanding Mars

name: Viral Enhancers
effect: When you play a plant, microbe, or an animal tag, including this, gain 1 plant or add 1 resource TO THAT CARD
description: Genetically engineered virus strains can be used to introduce favorable genes to other organisms

name: Carbonate Processing
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 3 steps
description: Common minerals can be converted into carbon dioxide that increases the greenhouse effect

name: Nuclear Power
text: Increase your mega credit production 2 steps and increase your energy production 3 steps
description: A simple way to satisfy your energy needs

name: Lightning Harvest
text: Requires 3 science tags. Increase your energy production and your mega credit production 1 step each
description: Floating supercapacitors connecting clouds with a superconducting wire. The triggered and collected discharges are beamed down to a receptor

name: Mining Rights
text: Place this tile on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus. Increase that production 1 step
description: The battles for Martian riches sometimes begin in a courtroom

name: Miranda Resort
text: Increase your mega credit production 1 step for each Earth tag you have
description: Situated on Verona Rupes, the highest vertical drop in the solar system, the resort attracts many of the thrill-seekers among the rich on Earth

name: Breathing Filters
text: Requires 7% oxygen
description: Allowing easy access to the still quite harsh environment

name: Trees
text: Requires -4C or warmer. Increase your plant production 3 steps. Gain 1 plant
description: Providing fruits, wood, and new habitats

name: Mangrove
text: Requires +4C or warmer. Place a greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN and raise oxygen 1 step. Disregard normal placement restrictions for this
description: A wetland forest will create an ecosystem where new species can thrive

name: Commercial District
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your mega credit production 4 steps. Place this tile.
description: Taking advantage of dense population centers
